document.full_text: sony launched its first tablet computers on tuesday in an ambitious attempt to grab the no.2 spot from samsung in a fast-growing market dominated by apple's year-old ipad.
document.title: sony chases apple with launch of android tablet
lines_and_colors: sony launched its first tablet computers on tuesday in an ambitious attempt to grab the no.2 spot from samsung in a fast-growing market dominated by apple's year-old ipad.
